alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 3:28AM CDT until September 20 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Fremont County in southwestern Iowa... South central Mills County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 327 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tabor, or 16 miles northeast of Nebraska City, moving east-southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...up to 60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Tabor, Riverton, Randolph, and Thurman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
